pullrequest.title: Switch Time.cc from CLOCK_REALTIME to CLOCK_MONOTONIC on *nix

content.raw: I would like to test this, but I am not really sure on how to do this. Using `clock_settime` on `CLOCK_REALTIME`would modify the global state, and probably requires permission that are not available for the user that executes the gazebo tests.
content.html: I would like to test this, but I am not really sure on how to do this. Using clock_settime on CLOCK_REALTIMEwould modify the global state, and probably requires permission that are not available for the user that executes the gazebo tests.
